name: Azure
hint: Select the environment where you want to deploy Logz.io Telemetry Collector.

datasources.name: Diagnostic settings
datasources.description: Logz.io Uses Azure Diagnostic settings logs to monitor your cloud services.

telemetries.hint: Switch the toggle on if you want Logz.io Telemetry Collector to collect logs from your Azure cloud services.

params.name: resource group
params.label: Resource group name to create for logz.io logs integration.
params.description: Resource group name for logz.io logs integration resources.
params.hint: A name for a new azure resource group to create for all logz.io integration resources

params.name: region
params.label: Azure region for the resource group deployment
params.description: Azure region for the respurce group deployment.
params.hint: Avilable regions: `Canada Central`, `Central US`, `East US`, `South Central US`, `West US 2`, `France Central`, `Germany West Central`, `North Europe`, `UK South`, `West Europe`
